isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - RIGHT REVERSE IDLER GEAR ASSEMBLY

note.para: Before starting reassembly, make sure the two magnetic discs are solidly in place at the bottom of the case. These can be secured with Scotch Grip Rubber Adhesive or equivalent adhesive.

step1.para: Position the reverse idler bearing, gear and washer in the case, washer to the front of the case ( Figure 174).

figure.caption: Figure 174. Position Reverse Idler Bearing, Gear and Washer in Case

step1.para: Install the idler shaft through the idler gear and into the case bore and washer, making sure the reverse idler shaft is seated in the bore of the support boss as far forward as possible. Install the washer and stop nut on the front of the shaft. Tighten nut to recommended torque setting ( Figure 175).

figure.caption: Figure 175. Install Washer and Stop Nut on Front of Shaft

step1.para: Install plug in the reverse idler shaft ( Figure 176).

figure.caption: Figure 176. Install Plug in Reverse Idler Shaft

step1.para: Install the auxiliary countershaft front bearing into the reverse idler gear case bore ( Figure 177).

figure.caption: Figure 177. Install Auxiliary Countershaft Front Bearing
